name: UnionPpqmPolicySetTemplateIdAndPpqmPolicySetTemplateId
title: Union of CH PPQm Policy Set Template ID And CH PPQm Policy Set Template ID

concept.definition: Template 201 -- Full access for the patient
Template 202 -- Read access in emergency mode
Template 301 -- Read access for a healthcare professional without delegation
Template 302 -- Read access for a group of healthcare professionals
Template 303 -- Full access for a representative
Template 304 -- Read access for a healthcare professional with delegation
